data.system_settings: iPhone 6S, iOS 10.3.3 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11 Golden Master
data.actual_result: The empty line (the second one) is completely missing.
data.expected_result: The second line should be displayed as an empty line
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a new message with the following conditions - First line any text, second line no text, third line any text again - Make sure that you are making a new line by clicking "Return" - Observe the result
